TABLE.NAME: sebtsprintroster_layouts
TABLE.COMMENT: SEBTS Print Roster Print Layout Options

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: A short title of the layout

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A description of the layout (eg. number of columns and rows).

FIELD.NAME: cols
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of columns in the table layout.

FIELD.NAME: rows
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of rows to print per page.

FIELD.NAME: printdirection
FIELD.COMMENT: Option: list roster down then across each page or across then down.

FIELD.NAME: imageheight
FIELD.COMMENT: Height in pixels of student picture.

FIELD.NAME: imagewidth
FIELD.COMMENT: Width in pixels of student picture.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user to which this class roster preference belongs.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course to which this class roster preference belongs.

FIELD.NAME: layoutid
FIELD.COMMENT: The print layout (number of rows and columns per page) selected for this class roster.

FIELD.NAME: lastused
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this preference record was used.
